Summary: Ball of light I thought was a star zigzagged super fast, then flew out the atmosphere.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving across hwy 40 i think through Arizona'a petrified Forest. It was about 7:30 pm and I saw a ball of light a little larger than a star fly at a super fast speed. It was right at the top of my windshield, so pretty low and it zigzagged from left to right and then burst out into the atmosphere. I knew it wasn't a falling star because it went from inside our atmosphere out to space. It flew at a tremendous amount of speed. No terrestrial craft I know of could maneuver like that.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Holbrook
There were no other sightings in Holbrook on or around December 4th 2008
